title: ShadowCash (SDC) Hits Market Capitalization of $517,629.00
content: ShadowCash (CURRENCY:SDC) traded up 1.3% against the US dollar during the 1-day period ending at 17:00 PM E.T. on June 2nd. In the last seven days, ShadowCash has traded 14.6% lower against the US dollar. ShadowCash has a market cap of $517,629.00 and $195.00 worth of ShadowCash was traded on exchanges in the last 24 hours. One ShadowCash coin can currently be bought for $0.0773 or 0.00001013 BTC on popular cryptocurrency exchanges.    Here’s how other cryptocurrencies have performed in the last 24 hours:    Crave (CRAVE) traded 4% lower against the dollar and now trades at $0.21 or 0.00002795 BTC.  Bitswift (SWIFT) traded 3.5% higher against the dollar and now trades at $0.58 or 0.00007658 BTC.  TeslaCoin (TES) traded 3.7% higher against the dollar and now trades at $0.0286 or 0.00000374 BTC.  Moin (MOIN) traded up 3.5% against the dollar and now trades at $0.0841 or 0.00001101 BTC.  Bitstar (BITS) traded 2.6% higher against the dollar and now trades at $0.0103 or 0.00000135 BTC.  Ratecoin (XRA) traded 4.4% lower against the dollar and now trades at $0.0015 or 0.00000019 BTC.  Swing (SWING) traded 1.8% higher against the dollar and now trades at $0.0534 or 0.00000699 BTC.  WINCOIN (WC) traded up 0% against the dollar and now trades at $0.32 or 0.00004157 BTC.  ClubCoin (CLUB) traded 1.7% lower against the dollar and now trades at $0.36 or 0.00004722 BTC.  Hyper (HYPER) traded up 9% against the dollar and now trades at $0.0188 or 0.00000246 BTC.   ShadowCash Profile     SDC is a PoW/PoS coin that uses the  Proof of Stake hashing algorithm. Its genesis date was July 19th, 2014. ShadowCash’s total supply is 6,695,133 coins. ShadowCash’s official Twitter account is @SDCoin and its Facebook page is accessible here . The Reddit community for ShadowCash is /r/shadowcash and the currency’s Github account can be viewed here . ShadowCash’s official message board is talk.shadowproject.io . ShadowCash’s official website is shadowproject.io .  According to CryptoCompare, “Specification – Block Time: 60 seconds – Difficulty Re-target: every block – Nominal Stake Interest: 2% annually – Min Transaction Fee: 0.0001 SDC – Confirmations: 10 – Maturity: 500 – Min Stake Age: 8 hours – no max age – P2P Port: 51737 – RPC Port: 51736 “    ShadowCash Coin Trading    ShadowCash can be purchased on these cryptocurrency exchanges: YoBit. It is usually not presently possible to purchase alternative cryptocurrencies such as ShadowCash directly using U.S. dollars. Investors seeking to trade ShadowCash should first purchase Ethereum or Bitcoin using an exchange that deals in U.S. dollars such as Coinbase , Changelly or Gemini. Investors can then use their newly-acquired Ethereum or Bitcoin to purchase ShadowCash using one of the aforementioned exchanges.
